data.name: Mockingbird
data.description: Bobbi Morse is an agent of S.H.I.E.L.D operative known as Mockingbird. She is a master undercover operative that can use her battle stave to lethal effectiveness.

starItems.name: Mockingbird

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.

Heal self and all <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Heal all other allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage. Rebound chain to <color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

Heal self and all <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>4</color> random <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> allies or self that were not at full energy on start of the current turn.

This attack cannot be blocked. In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack cannot be counterattacked.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Heal all non-<color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> allies by <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage. Rebound chain to <color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage.

Clear <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> from self and all <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> allies.

Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, to all <color=#fff568>AVENGER</color> and <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D.</color> allies below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health.

This attack cannot be blocked.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > This attack cannot be counterattacked.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to this character and all <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> allies.

1.description:
Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects to positive effects on self and all <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> and <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D.</color> allies.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.

Spread a random positive effect on self to all <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> and <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D.</color> allies, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.
Heal self and all allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack cannot be counterattacked or blocked.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to all enemies
Fill Speed Bar for a random Ronin ally by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.

1.description:
On End of any Turn, if this character or a <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> ally has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> and Health greater or equal to <color=#86e619>75%</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> on that character and fill that character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> + <color=#86e619>5%</color> for each non-summoned ally.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Max Health.
1.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health for self and <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> allies

2.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

On End of any Turn, if this character or a <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> ally has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> and Health greater or equal to <color=#86e619>75%</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> on that character and fill that character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> + <color=#86e619>5%</color> for each non-summoned ally.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health.

When this character or a non-summoned <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color>, to that ally

3.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

When this character or a non-summoned <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color>, to that ally.

On End of any Turn, if this character or a <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> ally has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> and Health greater or equal to <color=#86e619>75%</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> on that character and fill that character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color> + <color=#86e619>5%</color> for each non-summoned ally.

When this character, a <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color>, or <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D.</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, summon <color=#86e619>1</color> S.H.I.E.L.D. Assault with <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>
Fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>5%</color> for <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> allies
Fill Speed Bar by an additional +<color=#86e619>5%</color> for each non-summoned ally

4.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

When this character, a non-summoned <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color>, or a non-summoned <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D.</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, summon <color=#86e619>1</color> S.H.I.E.L.D. If that ally is a <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color>, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color>, to that ally.

On End of any Turn, if this character or a <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> ally has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> and Health greater or equal to <color=#86e619>75%</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> on that character and fill that character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> + <color=#86e619>10%</color> for each non-summoned ally.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to summoned S.H.I.E.L.D. Assault.
 > Summoned S.H.I.E.L.D. Assault and S.H.I.E.L.D. Medic allies gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Max Health.
 > Summoned S.H.I.E.L.D. Assault and S.H.I.E.L.D. Medic allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.
